content: World energy consumption is continuing to grow. The following portrays world primary energy, as harvested from nature [bp].

Energy consumption can be divided into four broad categories: Industry, Commercial, Residential, and Transportation. Industry will remain the dominant sector for the foreseeable future, but as countries develop, the other sectors become larger energy consumers. The land-rich developed countries--the United States, Canada, Australia, and New Zealand--have developed in a manner that requires greater transportation energy consumption.
